Q1: Q1: In the last 6 to 12 months, what is one improvement that you have led in your school? This can be in students, teachers, parents or the school in general
Q2: Q2: How did you get the idea for this improvement?
Q3: Q3: What did you do to implement this improvement?
Q4: Q4: What helped you implement this improvement in your school?
Q5: Q5: In the next 3-6 months, do you plan to do anything more for the improvement you led?
Q6: Q6: What are some challenges you face while implementing improvements in your school?
Q7: Q7: What are some other improvements you are planning in your school in the next 3-6 months?
Q8: Q8: What support do you need to implement these improvements in your school?
